function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Enhanced public health measures, improved ventilation systems, social distancing policies","category":"Managing drinking water safety detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing effective containment measures and vaccination strategies.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of strict
